FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In southeast, northerly 4 or 5 at first in south, otherwise variable 2 to 4 becoming cyclonic mainly northwesterly 4 to 6. In northwest, cyclonic 5 to 7 becoming northwesterly 4 to 6, then backing southwesterly later.
Sea state
Moderate or rough, becoming very rough in northwest.
Weather
In southeast, fair then rain. In northwest, rain or showers.
Visibility
In southeast, good, becoming moderate or poor for a time. In northwest, moderate or good, occasionally poor.
